title: Roasted carrots with spinach, pecans and dates

ingredients.item: 3 medjool dates, pitted and cut into small pieces

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 210˚C, gas mark 7. Cut the larger carrots in half lengthways, leaving small, slim ones whole. Put in a large roasting tin, toss with the oil and season. Roast for 40 minutes.
Mix in the pecans and roast for a further 5 minutes. Remove from the oven and stir through the spinach and sherry vinegar. Scatter over the dates and goats’ cheese, then serve immediately.
